__COMMENTS__: Comments are made on the __xxxxx__ uppercase entries
__NAME__: Import/create your case by modifying or creating a new case naming it

cell_kagome_lattice_test.__MESH_SIZE__: Bigger the lc bigger the beam elements
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__NUMBER_OF_CELLS__: DEFINE TESSELLATION IN THE DIRECTION OF THE LATTICE VECTORS
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__GEOMETRIC_NODES__: DEFINE THE CELL NUMBER OF GEOMETRIC NODES (NODES OF CONTRUCTION, NOT MESH NODES!)
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__GEOMETRIC_CONNECTIONS__: DEFINE THE CELL NUMBER OF GEOMETRIC CONNECTIONS (CONNECTIONS OF CONTRUCTION, NOT MESH CONNECTIONS!)
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__GEOMETRIC_NODES_COORDINATES__: COORDINATES OF THE NODES THAT DEFINE THE CELL
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__GEOMETRIC_NODES_CONNECTIONS__: NODE CONNECTIONS THAT DEFINE THE CELL. THE THIRD INDEX IS ALWAYS THE MATERIAL TAG
cell_kagome_lattice_test.__LATTICE_VECTORS__: DEFINITION OF THE LATTICE VECTORS FOLLOWS THE CONVENTION FIRST GEOMETRIC NODE TAG THEN SECOND GEOMETRIC NODE TAG
cell_kagome_lattice_test.___________________: SO IN THIS FIRST VECTOR WE HAVE THE NODES (0.0, 0.0) AND (1.48481, 0.69238). MUST BE 2 LATTICE VECTORS!!
